channel.title: Help fast plz!
channel.description:
Well, I wanted to make a shop, I added things, no error. Went online - tried to shop - got kicked. This is what I added:
[code] } else if (NPCID == 520 && NPCID == 521) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; // General Store }[/code]
[code]spawn = 520 3212 3248 0 0 0 0 0 2 Lumbridge General Store Shop Keeper spawn = 521 3211 3244 0 0 0 0 0 2 Lumbridge General Store Shop Assistant[/code]
[code]shop = 2 General Store 1 1 1931 30 1935 10 5603 10 1923 10 1887 10 590 10 1755 10 2347 10[/code]
Whats wrong with this?! :S
-Klomp3

item.title: Help fast plz!
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

marcbob:

Dude the shop is selling items with models not in your client…

You sir are on drugs…You have no idea what his client even is, how can you say something so stupid?

Yeah, did you try the command yet?

item.title: Help fast plz!
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

You’re doing it wrong.
Make this into a command, just create a command called “test” and use it, it will open the shop.

skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
WanneShop = 2; // General Store

Read full topic

item.title: Help fast plz!
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

[quote=“chippeh, post:8, topic:336695”]It’s this… like was said up top…

else if (NPCID == 520 && NPCID == 521) {

that means you have to talk to npc 520 AND 521 at the EXACT same time…

else if (NPCID == 520 || NPCID == 521) {

means EITHER! It’s that. >_>
oh, and you also need to make it on the SECOND click, not the first, well, it doesn’t really matter. Just make sure you know if you added it to first click or second click… O.o[/quote]

Didn’t worked, I allready tried that. (Scroll up to John459’s post)

Read full topic

item.title: Help fast plz!
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

It’s this… like was said up top…

else if (NPCID == 520 && NPCID == 521) {

that means you have to talk to npc 520 AND 521 at the EXACT same time…

else if (NPCID == 520 || NPCID == 521) {

means EITHER! It’s that. >_>
oh, and you also need to make it on the SECOND click, not the first, well, it doesn’t really matter. Just make sure you know if you added it to first click or second click… O.o

Read full topic

item.title: Help fast plz!
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:6, topic:336695”]heres an edit!

[quote author=klomp3 link=topic=433084.msg3179269#msg3179269 date=1271170088]

spawn = 520 3212 3248 0 0 0 0 0 2 //Lumbridge General Store Shop Keeper spawn = 521 3211 3244 0 0 0 0 0 2 //Lumbridge General Store Shop Assistant

[/quote][/quote]

No… I allready tried that and didn’t worked.

[quote=“John459, post:5, topic:336695”]Change

} else if (NPCID == 520 && NPCID == 521) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; // General Store }

To

} else if (NPCID == 520 || NPCID == 521) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; WanneShop = 2; // General Store }[/quote]

Also didn’t worked

[quote=“TheLastViking, post:4, topic:336695”]I added one

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------- WanneShop = 50 //Member Shop [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
In your case

]//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------- WanneShop = 2 //Lummy store or what ever it is in client.java[/code][/quote]

There aint such thing in my client.java :S

Read full topic
